body.name: Chicco Alfa Lite® Lightweight Travel Playard, Portable Playpen for Babies and Toddlers, Snap-Open/Compact Fold Design,13 lbs., Baby Travel Essential | Midnight/Navy
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 44 mins
features: ULTIMATE PORTABILITY – Simplifies on-the-go sleep with a lightweight frame, fast, snap-open set up, compact fold and zippered carry bag for a convenient travel crib.

ZIP-OPEN SIDE PANEL – For gentle placement of younger babies or easy in-and-out for toddlers, a side panel conveniently zips open to a full-size mattress and baby play area for infants and toddlers up to 35” tall.
GREENGUARD Gold Certified – GREENGUARD Gold certified for low chemical emissions, contributing to heathier air quality around baby.
ZIP-OFF FABRICS – Mattress cover and frame fabrics on the playpen are removeable and machine washable for easy cleaning.
body.description: Sleep in a SnapSimplify on-the-go sleep with the Alfa Lite Lightweight Travel Playard. Weighing only 13 lbs., the feather-weight portable playpen design, zippered carry bag and fast, snap-open set up provides the perfect, hassle-free start to your overnight outing. GREENGUARD Gold Certified, the Alfa Lite Lightweight Travel Playard has been tested for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality around baby.The baby playard features a compact fold configuration that effortlessly snaps open to offer a full-size, padded sleeping and baby play area for infants and toddlers up to 35" tall. A zip-open side panel allows for gentle placement and soothing of younger babies, while allowing older babies and toddlers to crawl directly in and out of the large playpen.For complete convenience, the travel crib features a zip-off mattress cover and zip-off playard fabrics for quick, machine washing and easy maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I got this one!
reviews.reviewText: I had no intentions of buying a travel crib or pack and play for a long time, because we have a large play pin in the living room. But my baby is so mobile now and while working from home, sometimes I need her to stay put. This thing took less than 5 minutes to put together and make ready to use. It’s extremely light! Definitely a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Incredibly easy to set up and put away for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This play yard is so light, easy to set up, great for shorter mommas, and I'm loving the side zipper! This is one of my new favorite purchases. My 19 month old is really enjoying the ability to crawl into and out of his bed all by himself and so am I! Plus the ability to still keep him contained after he is in by zipping it closed is fabulous. The zipper has worked perfectly, regardless of whether he is in it or not at the time. I haven't needed to wash it yet, but I'm so glad to be able to when it needs it, unlike most other options. Now, we've only been using this product for a month, but so far I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a play yard/travel sleeping area that is light weight, washable, easy to transport, and allows a toddler to get in and out without having to be lifted, but still being able to be contained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems well made and lightweight to move around. I researched a lot and happy with this purchase. Fits well in a smaller apartment and for travel. This one is similar but cheaper than the lotus and better value in my opinion. Would like the mattress a bit thicker but it'd comparable to how they're all made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to set up/take down and carry
reviews.reviewText: I have two of these - one for home/travel and one for my office (my daughter regularly comes to work with me). It is genuinely easy to set up and take up - set-up takes me 30 seconds, take-down 1-2 minutes. Very light, but it feels sturdy when set up and my daughter is a rambunctious one. I would suggest putting a blanket or crib cover over the mattress as it does attract lint, but this isn’t a deal-breaker for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up, easy transport
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. I had a traditional pack n play before and I will never go back! So easy to set up. Literally seconds. Feels sturdy and quality. I like that the mattress lays on the floor so I don’t worry about bowing. My 7 mo adjusted great. Also very lightweight and easy to carey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel play yard
reviews.reviewText: This travel play yard was a great get. We used it to travel with out LO and it was easy to pack and unpack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Bought in preparation for when our baby starts crawling. This is the lightest there is in the market and hood quality. Loss of space for kid but they'll be fine with toys. Definitely recommend!!
